title: kaLLamillAdunnai
sahitya:
kaLLamillAdunnai paNivOrkk-aruLum veLLai malar amar vANiyE kalimaNiyE


anupallavi

  veLLamena kavitai isaiyinbam nalguvAi uLLam kaLi koLLa kalaigaLum aLippAi


caraNam    pAmAlai pala shUDiyE nI vINai kaikoNDE vEdam isaittiDuvAi
pAmararum palkalai vANavarum pOTrum IDiNai illA ezhil uruvE annaiyE
